positive_examples: This is an example of military doctrine.
The military doctrine demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed military doctrine in this context.
A typical case of military doctrine would involve these features.
The concept of military doctrine applies here.
Fundamental principles and strategic guidelines that govern military operations and decision-making.
negative_examples: This is an example of multinational doctrine, not military doctrine.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: MultinationalDoctrine, or other types of Doctrine

definition: Fundamental principles guiding military forces in achieving objectives.
